title: Guns and Butter - 2011 Dec 28 WE [sebaygo1]
description:
.

Guns and Butter
Wednesday, 28 December 2011


\"Critique of Ron Paul\'s Austerity Plan\"

with Webster Griffin Tarpley.

Ron Paul\'s \"Plan to Restore America\" includes $1 trillion in cuts to the federal budget in one year. We take a look at what this would mean for the American people. Ron Paul is the republican front runner to win the Iowa Caucus on January 3rd, 2012.

NOTE: Tarpley has a long-standing dislike for the Austrian School of economic thought in general, and for Ron Paul in particular, so he basically went into his analysis of Paul\'s plan with his mind already made up.




================================================

\"Guns & Butter\" investigates the relationships among capitalism, militarism and politics. Maintaining a radical perspective in the aftermath of the September 11th attacks, \"Guns & Butter: The Economics of Politics\" reports on who wins and who loses when the economic resources of civil society are diverted toward global corporatization, war, and the furtherance of a national security state. <a href="
http://www.kpfa.org/guns-and-butter" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.kpfa.org/guns-and-butter</a>

================================================
